page.title: 03Auckley-village
page.content: {Auckley}is situated about 5 miles S.E. of Doncaster,on the B1396.It has no industries to speak of,with just a few services such as one public house (the Eagle and Child), a garage,fish&chip shop,2 small-supermarkets,a florist, and a hair-dressers. {Auckley}did boast of having a night club.This was called the Side-Saddle,but lately became known as Rigsby's. Its future is uncertain,and it is presently boarded up. There are over 500 dwellings in the village.Most of the housing being built in the late 1960's. The population is about 2500.The few services that exist are situated on Ellers Lane. The majority of residents use the services in Doncaster.The buildings now under construction are of an Executive type, future building if any, will be of a similar nature.
